channel.title: ISO - Calamares Installer created /etc/fstab
channel.description:
This is the what is shown if the Kicksecure ISO installer was used to install Kicksecure on an internal harddrive.
cat /etc/fstab
``` # /etc/fstab: static file system information. # # Use 'blkid' to print the universally unique identifier for a device; this may # be used with UUID= as a more robust way to name devices that works even if # disks are added and removed. See fstab(5). # # <file system> <mount point> <type> <options> <dump> <pass> UUID=4B6E-AD38 /boot/efi vfat defaults,noatime 0 2 /dev/mapper/luks-c17a9191-d3e5-45c6-b14a-7b3acfce8d3b / ext4 defaults,noatime 0 1 /dev/mapper/luks-693dceb4-323e-474e-955b-b51d2e1772a7 swap swap defaults,noatime 0 0 ```

item.title: ISO - Calamares Installer created /etc/fstab
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is the what is shown if the Kicksecure ISO installer was used to install Kicksecure on an internal harddrive.

cat /etc/fstab

# /etc/fstab: static file system information.
#
# Use 'blkid' to print the universally unique identifier for a device; this may
# be used with UUID= as a more robust way to name devices that works even if
# disks are added and removed. See fstab(5).
#
# <file system>             <mount point>  <type>  <options>  <dump>  <pass>
UUID=4B6E-AD38                            /boot/efi      vfat    defaults,noatime 0 2
/dev/mapper/luks-c17a9191-d3e5-45c6-b14a-7b3acfce8d3b /              ext4    defaults,noatime 0 1
/dev/mapper/luks-693dceb4-323e-474e-955b-b51d2e1772a7 swap           swap    defaults,noatime 0 0

Read full topic
